story:
Once upon a time, in the heart of the ancient city of Thebes, there was a young girl named Meryet. She was a kind and curious girl who loved to explore the wonders of her city.

One day, Meryet stumbled upon a hidden passageway in the Temple of Amun-Ra. She followed the passageway and found herself in a hidden chamber. To her surprise, she found a beautiful golden harp inside the chamber.

Meryet had never seen such a magnificent instrument before. She reached out and touched the strings, and to her amazement, the harp began to play a beautiful melody.

The melody was so enchanting that it lulled Meryet to sleep, and she began to dream. In her dream, she was transported to a magical world filled with talking animals, fairies, and enchanted forests.

Meryet spent many days in this magical world, making new friends and experiencing wonderful adventures. But eventually, she knew it was time to return home.

When Meryet woke up, she found herself back in the hidden chamber with the golden harp. She carefully picked up the harp and brought it back to her home.

From that day forward, Meryet would play the golden harp every night before bed. The melody would lull her to sleep and take her on a magical journey through her dreams.

And so, Meryet lived happily, always looking forward to her nightly adventures in the magical world of the golden harp. Goodnight, my dear daughter. May your dreams take you on many wondrous journeys.
